channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Sign-up Sheets
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Sign-up Sheets

item.title: CVE-2021-24440|2024-08-03T19:28:24.002Z -- unknown -- sign-up%20sheets
item.description: The Sign-up Sheets WordPress plugin before 1.0.14 did not sanitise or escape some of its fields when creating a new sheet, allowing high privilege users to add JavaScript in them, leading to a Stored Cross-Site Scripting issue. The payloads will be triggered when viewing the 'All Sheets' page in the admin dashboard

item.title: CVE-2021-24441|2024-08-03T19:28:23.991Z -- unknown -- sign-up%20sheets
item.description: The Sign-up Sheets WordPress plugin before 1.0.14 does not not sanitise or validate the Sheet title when generating the CSV to export, which could lead to a CSV injection issue
